text: Soretomo anata gata wa,-saki ni sugisatta-sha-tachi ga deatta yōna (kokoromi ga) mada otozurenai saki ni (shijō no kōfuku no)-en ni hairou to kangaeru no ka. Kare-ra wa sainan ya konkyū ni mimaware,(fuan no naka ni) dōyō sa se rarete, shito mo, issho no shinja-tachi mo,`arrā no o tasuke wa, nanji (kuru)darou.' To sakenda hododeatta. Ā, hontōni arrā no o tasuke wa chikadzuite iru
